00018 typedef struct deadlist_s {
00019   traceobj_t* next;
00020   traceobj_t* prev;
00021 } deadlist_t;
00022 
00023 struct state_s {
00024   pqueue_t     pqueue;     /* Priority queue -- holds affected closures. */
00025   closurestk_t closurestk; /* Closure stack -- for assigning end-times. */
00026   deadlist_t*  deadlist;   /* Dead-list -- tracks dead allocations */
00027   codeloc_t*   codeloc;    /* Current code location -- See "codeloc.h" */
00028   context_t*   context;    /* Current context -- See "context.h" */
00029   closure_t*   metalvl;    /* "Meta-Level" "closure" -- simplifies a few things */
00030   closure_t*   closure;    /* Current closure -- See "closure.h" */
00031   timestamp_t* time_now;   /* Current time. */
00032   timestamp_t* time_end;   /* Used for propagation only.  NULL otherwise. ---
00033                               Currently this can be (and is) used to test for
00034                               "propagation mode". */
00035 };
